card1.title: Heal. Balance. Evolve.
card1.desc: Centering you and your family’s health, so you can get well and stay well.

testimonial.desc1: Integrating centuries-old healing traditions with science and medical testing.
testimonial.desc2: IMI’s practitioners work with awareness that your health is connected to seven key factors. Mind, body, emotions, spirit, energy, community and environment.
testimonial.desc3: We’re led by science and nature. Find the root cause of your concern for sustained healing.

card1.title: Naturopathic & functional medicine
card1.desc: Treat the root cause of your concern with nutrition, homeopathy and world class supplements.

card2.title: Psychology, counselling & coaching
card2.desc: From diagnosis to support; our psychotherapists, counsellors and coaches are here for you.

card3.title: Bodywork & energy medicine
card3.desc: Osteopathy. Craniosacral therapy. Acupuncture. TCM. Nourish your physical and energetic body.

card4.title: Labs, IV & conventional medicine
card4.desc: Advice from our family GP, medical testing from allergies to digestion and IV therapy.

product.desc: Clinical grade formulas, tried and trusted by doctors and clients worldwide.

dispensary.desc: Visit us to explore our products and services. Our dispensary carries Hong Kong’s largest range of practitioner-recommended supplements.

card1.title: Meet our practitioners
card1.desc: Peace of mind comes as standard. Our practitioners’ treatments are properly regulated and follow a strict code of ethics.

card2.title: Your health, online
card2.desc: Better wellbeing, at the click of a button. No matter where you are in the world, you can always receive quality healthcare.

card3.title: Corporate wellness
card3.desc: Interactive health talks and urban wellness retreats for business leaders and employees.

healthCondition.desc: We don’t just treat your symptoms. Through careful assessment and testing, we discover and treat the root cause of your health concern.

healthHub.desc: Three decades of health and wellness wisdom at your fingertips.

card1.title: Stress busting herbs : the power of adaptogens
card1.desc: Adaptogens are powerful herbs that help our bodies build resilience to stress and sleep better. Discover our naturopaths’ top recommendations for peace of mind.

card2.title: How meditation nourishes mental health
card2.desc: Meditation is recommended for mental health - but why? Catriona Rogers, IMI counsellor, explains how it helps us access the Heartmind, our innate healing power.

bookNow.desc: Health can be complex. For signposting in the right direction, book a free 20 minute consultation.
